Scenes > The Aburaya Tea House

– Click image to view.

The Aburaya Tea House

(古市油屋) (Furuichi aburaya)

Performance: May 1973 National Theatre: The Bloodshed at Ise

Production: May 1973 National Theatre

Narrators:

Takemoto Nanbudayū V (竹本南部大夫 (五))

Takemoto Datejidayū (see also Takemoto Datetayū V) (竹本伊達路大夫)

Shamisen (Musicians):

Nozawa Matsunosuke (野澤松之輔)

Tsuruzawa Jūzō IV (鶴澤重造 (四))
